texts.Home.Hero.Title: English Teacher
texts.Home.Hero.Subtitle: Get international TESOL certificate from LTi Australia in just <b>200 hours of study and practice
texts.Home.Hero.Stats.Students.Label: Graduated Students
texts.Home.Hero.Stats.Experience.Label: Experience
texts.Home.Hero.Stats.Satisfaction.Label: Student Satisfaction
texts.Home.About.Label: About Us
texts.Home.About.Title: About LTi Australia
texts.Home.About.Description: LTi Australia is a leading organization in TESOL training, recognized for excellence and innovation in language education.
texts.Home.About.Features.Founded.Title: Founded
texts.Home.About.Features.Founded.Description: LTi is a pioneer in TESOL training in Australia, the first organization to receive government certification for TESOL Certificate in 1996.
texts.Home.About.Features.Registration.Title: Registration
texts.Home.About.Features.Registration.Descrip: Officially registered as a Registered Training Organization recognized by the Australian Government (RTO No. 30173) since 1998.
texts.Home.About.Features.Experience.Title: Experience
texts.Home.About.Features.Experience.Descripti: Over 28 years of building reputation both domestically and internationally in TESOL training.
texts.Home.About.Features.Partners.Title: Partner Organizations
texts.Home.About.Features.Partners.Description: 50 organizations have used LTi's TESOL courses and materials.
texts.Home.About.Features.Impact.Title: Impact
texts.Home.About.Features.Impact.Description: Trained over 16,000 students worldwide, including both native and non-native English teachers
texts.Home.About.Features.Subsidiary.Title: Subsidiary
texts.Home.About.Features.Subsidiary.Descripti: LTi is a division of Universal Education and Training Ltd. (ABN: 75 090 720 086).
texts.Home.About.Footer: In Vietnam, TESOL Channel is proud to be the official distributor of LTi Australia, bringing high-quality TESOL Online programs and connecting with English centers and universities nationwide. We are committed to accompanying you on your journey to become a professional English teacher with international certification.
texts.Home.Schedule.Label: Study Time
texts.Home.Schedule.Title:
Flexible Schedule,
Suitable for Everyone
texts.Home.Schedule.Description: LTi's TESOL Online program provides flexible scheduling, allowing you to study during morning, afternoon, or evening sessions according to your needs and schedule. Additionally, you will receive a lifetime account, enabling you to review and reference materials anytime.
texts.Home.Schedule.Morning.Title: Morning
texts.Home.Schedule.Afternoon.Title: Afternoon
texts.Home.Schedule.Evening.Title: Evening
texts.Home.Teachers.Label: Our Teachers
texts.Home.Teachers.Title:
Professional Teachers
from LTi Australia
texts.Home.Teachers.Feature1: The program is taught directly by a team of professional, experienced teachers from LTi Australia.
texts.Home.Teachers.Feature2: Teachers will guide and support you throughout the learning process, ensuring you absorb knowledge effectively.
texts.Home.Teachers.Feature3: With flexible scheduling and professional guidance from LTi Australia, the TESOL Online program will certainly provide you with an excellent learning experience.
